T

TapAndHoldEvent - Class in vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events
Holds the information associated with a tap and hold event.
TapAndHoldEvent(int, int, long[], long) - Constructor for class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events.TapAndHoldEvent
Calls the constructor of TuioEvent and passes it the event's coordinates and the cursors associated with the event.
tapAndHoldEvent(TapAndHoldEvent) - Method in class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.Zone
Tap and Hold Event's default action is rotating the zone 90 degrees.
TapEvent - Class in vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events
Holds the information associated with a tap event or multiple taps event.
TapEvent(int, int, long[], int) - Constructor for class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.events.TapEvent
Calls the constructor of TuioEvent and passes it the event's coordinates and the cursors associated with the event.
tapEvent(TapEvent) - Method in class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.Zone
Tap Event's default action is printing the line "You (double) tapped a zone".

Touch - Class in vialab.simpleMultiTouch
Extending TuioCursor to rename it Touch
Touch(TuioCursor) - Constructor for class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.Touch
This constructor takes the attributes of the provided TuioCursor and assigns these values to the newly created Touch.
Touch(long, int, float, float) - Constructor for class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.Touch
This constructor takes the provided Session ID, Cursor ID, X and Y coordinate and assigns these values to the newly created Touch.
Touch(TuioTime, long, int, float, float) - Constructor for class vialab.simpleMultiTouch.Touch
This constructor takes a TuioTime argument and assigns it along with the provided Session ID, Cursor ID, X and Y coordinate to the newly created Touch.
